doc:
Paul Ben-Victor https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paul_Ben-Victor 0 Paul Ben-Victor (born Paul Friedman; July 24, 1965) is an American actor. He is best known for playing Greek mobster Spiros "Vondas" Vondopoulos on the HBO drama series The Wire. Paul_Ben-Victor ( born Paul_Friedman ; July_24_,_1965 ) is an_American_actor . He is_best_known for playing Greek_mobster_Spiros_"_Vondas_"_Vondopoulos on the_HBO_drama_series The_Wire .
